body:
Mollie module

Send SMS messages through Mollie / MessageBird
mollie
Tangler\Module\Mollie\Module

Action: New message action

This action sends a new SMS message
new_message
Tangler\Module\Mollie\SendMessageAction
  • username (string): Username
  • password (string): Password
  • message (string): Message contents
  • mobile (string): Recipient mobile number
  • originator (string): Originator
